attributes.action: Reduce the impact of global warming to less than 1.5c in Britain
attributes.additional_details: Reference: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Global Warming of 1.5c report published in October 2018.
attributes.background:
Legislate that any natural or man-made material consumes less than 1.5c of the country's resources when used to extract, manufacture, build or maintain infrastructure or goods.  
We need to act now on the IPCC Global warming report to stop environmental & health issues for future generations.
